You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ELEVATE DOCUMENTATION
Integration

Samples for JSON Web Tokens, and one-time and recurring donations with custom Elevate donation pages.

NOTE Salesforce is retiring the Elevate family of products. This affects Elevate Advanced Edition, Elevate Power of Us Editions, and all add-ons. As part of this product retirement, the ability to renew subscriptions to this product will end on October 1, 2023, and we anticipate that the product will be deactivated on or after October 1, 2024.
Use Salesforce.org Payments API in Custom Donation Pages
Learn more about how to integrate Payments API with custom donation pages.
SAMPLE: One-time Donation Using Custom Donation Pages
Use a sample script to set up a one-time donation.
SAMPLE: One-time Donation With PayPal Using Custom Donation Pages
Use the sample script to set up a one-time donation using PayPal.
SAMPLE: Recurring Donations Using Custom Donation Pages
Use a sample script to set up recurring donations.
SAMPLE: One-time and Recurring Donations Using Custom Donation Pages
Use a sample script to create one-time and recurring donations.
SAMPLE: Create a JSON Web Token (JWT)
Use this sample script to generate a JWT to use in your Elevate API calls.
SAMPLE: Use a JSON Web Token (JWT)
Learn about using a JWT in an Elevate API endpoint.
Use Salesforce.org Payments API in Backend Code
Learn more about how to use Payments API in backend code.
Use Salesforce.org Payments API with NPSP Advanced Mapping
Learn more about how to use Payments API with NPSP Advanced Mapping.
